programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Trapped and alone in a terrifying Dalek city, the Doctor is at the heart of an evil Empire; no sonic, no TARDIS, nobody to help. With his greatest temptation before him, he must try hard to resist.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a girl with a star in her eye leads to a terrifying chase across time and space. Bill's mind is opened to a Universe that is bigger and more exciting than she could possibly have imagined.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The magical final chapter of the twelfth Doctor's journey sees the Time Lord team up with his former self, the first ever Doctor, and a returning Bill Potts, for one last adventure.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The human race rejoices as the ghosts of loved ones return home. But as the Doctor, Rose and Jackie investigate the Torchwood Tower, the whole of modern-day Earth threatens to fall.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The TARDIS lands in 1930s New York. In the midst of the Depression, people are disappearing off the streets. Meanwhile, at the very top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor's oldest enemies are at work, plotting their largest scheme yet.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Dalek Sec is reborn in human form and plans to build a Dalek empire in 1930s New York. While Martha fights for her life at the top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor must enter into an unholy alliance in order to change Dalek history forever.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Clara is alone in Victorian London with a man she doesn't know, a dinosaur in the Thames, and a spate of deadly spontaneous combustions. The Doctor has changed. It's time you knew him.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A Dalek fleet surrounds a lone rebel ship and only the Doctor can help them.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: When Robots threaten Sherwood forest, the Doctor must join forces with Robin Hood to stop the evil reign of the Sheriff of Nottingham.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Clara crash land on the moon to find a world of horror: a mining base full of corpses, vicious spider-like creatures poised to attack and a terrible dilemma.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Clara are on the most beautiful train in history speeding among the stars of the future. Unfortunately a deadly creature is stalking the passengers and once you see the mummy you only have 66 seconds to live.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Separated from the Doctor, Clara discovers a new menace from another dimension. With people to save and the Doctor trapped, Clara comes up against an enemy that exists beyond human perception.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: One morning in every city in the world, the human race wakes up to face the most surprising invasion yet. Everywhere, a forest has grown and taken back the Earth.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In the mysterious world of the Nethersphere, plans have been drawn. Missy is about to come face to face with the Doctor and an impossible choice is looming.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Ghosts of the past and future crowd into the lives of the Doctor and Clara and send them on an adventure that takes them to the end of the universe.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor attempts to break into the most dangerous bank in the cosmos.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Trapped in a world unlike any other he has seen, the Doctor faces the greatest challenge of his many lives. Pursued by the fearsome creature known only as the Veil, he must attempt the impossible.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Madame de Pompadour's dreams are being haunted by a stranger called the Doctor. When she finds the court of Versailles under attack from clockwork droids she tries to summon her mysterious Doctor to save the day.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A young woman finds cryptic messages from 1969 coming from a stranger called the Doctor when people start disappearing.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: After landing in an abandoned library in the 51st century, the Doctor, Donna and a team of archaeologists face a swarm of flesh-eating creatures that are seen only as shadows.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: As the shadows rise, the Doctor forges an alliance with the mysterious River Song. While the Doctor discovers secrets and revelations about his own future, the sinister Nodes declare that Donna is doomed.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: After being going for five years, the Doctor reappears in Amy's life and she is faced with having to make a terrible choice.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Amy finds herself battling a deadly alien in France with none other than Vincent Van Gogh.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In 2013, something terrible is awakening in London's National Gallery. In 1562, a murderous plot is afoot in Elizabethan England. Meanwhile, somewhere in space an ancient battle reaches its devastating conclusion.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor must sacrifice everything to save a town called Christmas from the Time Lord's greatest enemies.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: It's the Tenth Doctor's final journey and his psychotic nemesis the Master has been reborn, on Christmas Eve. The Doctor faces the end of his life as the Master's plans hurtle out of control.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor must sacrifice everything to save a town called Christmas from the Time Lord's greatest enemies.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Montgomery, Alabama. 1955. The Doctor and her friends find themselves in the Deep South of America. As they encounter a seamstress by the name of Rosa Parks, they begin to wonder whether someone is attempting to change history.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Once the Doctor and her crew find their way back to Yorkshire, they find something stirring amongst the eight-legged arachnid population of Sheffield.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who is unable to remember her own name falls from the night sky, and forever changes the lives of Ryan Sinclair, Yasmin Khan, and Graham O'Brien.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor discovers demons haunting the land of Punjab, India in 1947, while the country is being torn apart.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A mysterious message arrives in a package addressed to the Doctor, leading her, Graham, Yaz and Ryan to investigate the warehouse moon orbiting Kandoka, and the home of the galaxy's largest retailer: Kerblam.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Intelligence agents around the world are under attack from alien forces. MI6 turns to the only people who can help: the Doctor and friends. As they travel the globe for answers, attacks come from all sides.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A terrifying plan to destroy humanity is about to reach fruition. Can the Doctor and her friends escape multiple traps and defeat a deadly alliance.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: On the edge of Niagara Falls in 1903, the Doctor and friends discover something, or someone, is sabotaging Nikola Tesla's generating station.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Ko Sho Blo! Trigger-happy space police the Judoonare targeting 21st century Gloucester. The Doctor, Yaz, Ryan and Graham race back to Earth in order to prevent them doing too much damage to the cathedral city.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: From ancient Syria, to present day Sheffield, and out into the wilds of space, something is stalking the Doctor and her friends.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In 1816 at Lake Geneva, Lord Byron and the Shelleys prepare for a night telling ghost stories, but their villa proves to have ghostly presences all its own.

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In the epic and emotional series finale, the Cybermen are on the march. As the last remaining humans are ruthlessly hunted down, Graham, Ryan and Yaz face a terrifying fight to survive.

programme.desc: With the Doctor locked away in an alien prison, Yaz, Ryan and Graham are on Earth having to carry on with their lives without her. However, they soon discover a disturbing plan forming involving a Dalek. How can you fight a Dalek without the Doctor.

programme.desc: As the New Year begins, a terrifying evil is stirring from across the centuries of Earth's history. Will the Doctor, Ryan, Graham and Yaz be able to overcome this threat to Planet Earth.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: Christmas Comes Twice
programme.desc: A top newscaster finds herself regretting letting her man go five years ago. When a Christmas carnival comes to town, she is brought back in time to reconnect with him.

programme.title: The Christmas House
programme.desc: When a TV star's parents ask him to bring back a revered family tradition, he revisits the family's traditions and brings back the magic of Christmases past.

programme.title: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
programme.desc: Two long-time rival school teachers duke it out during the holidays in a bake-off. With both determined to win the prize, their competitiveness could jeopardize what matters most this Christmas season.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: Newlywed couple celebrates their first Christmas by inviting their families to join them. When he gets laid off and she finds out she is pregnant, they try and keep their secrets hidden to have a smooth holiday.

programme.title: Entertaining Christmas
programme.desc: A cookbook author's daughter is set to take over the family business. Only problem is, she can't cook. When she sees an online video asking for help, she is determined to change the family ways, and become known for helping in other ways.

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead
programme.desc: A famous actress heads to a Christmas-obsessed town to film a movie, and is thrown for a loop when a romance brews between her and a local inn keeper, who's a single dad. As she gets a taste of small-town life, she discovers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor
programme.desc: A rookie party planner works with a serious and all-business to put together a Christmas festival with help from a merrily enigmatic caretaker who looks like Santa. As the festival approaches, the spirit of the holidays may lead to a wish of love.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers are thrown together to help an elderly woman recover her lost savings. While working together, the magic of the season prevails, leading the couple to discover something they have been missing, love.

programme.title: Finding Santa
programme.desc: When the Santa who stars in their annual holiday parade falls off his sleigh and injures himself, a woman must go on a quest to find the perfect Santa.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is hired to become a personal shopper for an uptight, corporate executive. As they work together, she teaches him that Christmas has less to do with the money that is spent, and more to do with the people in your life.

programme.title: Christmas She Wrote
programme.desc: A romance writer has her column cancelled right before Christmas, so she heads home to reconnect with her family and sparks some romance of her own.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A pastry chef makes it to the final round of a renowned baking competition and finds herself asking her high school sweetheart for help. As they grow closer, she realizes the must embrace the Christmas spirit or risk losing a chance at love.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A world-travelling photographer takes some time off at Christmas to care for her grandmother. While there, she meets her neighbour, who needs help caring for his young nephew, and love develops.

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when her long time crush, Mitch, moves to her little town. Once she discovers his love for Christmas has changed she vows to bring his holiday spirit back.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered marketing executive on her way to a wedding is derailed by car trouble. A fork in the road leads her to Christmas Valley, and her unexpected journey leaves her wondering what her life has been missing.

programme.title: Love, Lights, Hanukkah!
programme.desc: A woman prepares her restaurant for the busiest time of the year when she receives the results of her DNA test indicating that she is Jewish. The discovery leads her to a new family, and an unlikely romance over eight nights.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with her liver donor, and his selfless gesture leads to a Christmas miracle for everyone.

programme.title: Christmas at Dollywood
programme.desc: When a NYC event planner returns to Tennessee to plan the Christmas celebration at Dollywood, she's paired with the head of operations who thinks he can handle the party just fine on his own.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: Identical twin sisters decide to swap lives for the holidays, learning valuable lessons along the way.

programme.title: Tournament of Roses Parade
programme.desc: We may not be able to host the traditional Rose Parade, but we won't let January 1 pass without celebrating the New Year in spectacular fashion. Join us for a reimagined celebration featuring musical and marching band performances and guest appearances.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility and Snowmen
programme.desc: A Christmas enthusiast, and her sister, clash with their latest client, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: A woman is hired by a Royal family to repair a carousel for them before Christmas.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Bride
programme.desc: A wedding planner heads off to Alaska to source a rare flower for a bride. While there, she is charmed by a handsome botanist who shows her what the town has to offer for the holidays.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: When a resort executive is sent to a newly purchased lodge in Maine with instructions to turn it into an ultra-modern resort, she finds a charming, successful lodge loaded with holiday spirit and makes a connection with the owner's handsome son.

programme.title: Christmas Town
programme.desc: A woman leaves behind a life in Boston to embark on a new adventure. Unbeknownst to her, she ends up on an unexpected detour that changes both her life, and her romantic future.

programme.title: A Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job at a ritzy NYC hotel, a woman accepts a job as a governess to a young girl. She finds herself attracted to the girl’s father, who is king of the country, and love reigns over the kingdom.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur invents a new dating app designed to help singles find dates to events. She personally tests it out in the weeks before Christmas and is connected with a like-minded individual whom she's already dated, several times.

programme.title: Christmas List
programme.desc: Planning a storybook Christmas with her boyfriend proves challenging for a woman when he goes AWOL. A tempting new romance turns her life upside down.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A television producer is forced to work with the man who broke her heart on a country music Christmas special while being interrupted by Christmas spirits determined for her to revisit her past.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: A woman offers stranded family a place to stay during a blizzard. Unbeknownst to her, they are members of a royal family. Despite their different backgrounds, the woman shows her guests what a small-town Christmas is all about.

programme.title: Good Morning Christmas!
programme.desc: Two squabbling TV hosts are sent to a festive small town over Christmas. While pretending to get along for the sake of appearance, they discover that there's more to each other than they thought.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: Former classmates find themselves travelling home together for the holidays. When a storm hits, they must work together to each get to their destination.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: When her family's beloved eatery, The Starlight Café, is slated for demolition, Annie vows to put a stop to it before Christmas.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two co-workers vying for the same promotion are tasked with creating a 12 Days of Christmas scavenger hunt to promote the premiere of a new hotel.

programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: At Christmas, a cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical VP and his eclectic team to help a charity in need.

programme.title: Taking a Shot at Love
programme.desc: A professional dancer uses ballet to help a hockey player get back in the game.

programme.title: One Winter Proposal
programme.desc: Old flames burn bright when a group of people meet up again for a ski weekend.

programme.title: Love on Ice
programme.desc: A former figure skater gets an improbably shot to reclaim skating glory when a young coach sees greatness in her. They find their love of skating goes far beyond the ice.

programme.title: Amazing Winter Romance
programme.desc: A journalist heads to her home town to find some inspiration for new stories. There, she discovers her childhood friend has built a giant snow maze, which leads to her to her one true love.

programme.title: A Gift to Remember
programme.desc: An accident between a sweet bookshop worker and a handsome stranger leaves him without his memory.

programme.title: Project Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A woman plays the small-town Santa and makes holiday wishes come true. This year, she finds not only is she able to help others, she is also able to help herself.

programme.title: The Christmas Card
programme.desc: Moved by an anonymous Christmas card sent to the front lines of Afghanistan, a lonely career militarist travels to the small town of Nevada City to meet its sender.

programme.title: Deliver by Christmas
programme.desc: A bakery owner is enchanted by a mystery client whom she has never met.

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas
programme.desc: A girl tells Santa she wants a boyfriend for Christmas, years later, her wish comes true.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: A highly ambitious anchorwoman makes an offhand wish to an office party Santa. She wakes up the next morning to find she is married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Holiday for Heroes
programme.desc: Worlds suddenly collide for a woman and a soldier who have been exchanging letters for a year finally meet.

programme.title: Time for Us to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Five guests converge on an inn to celebrate Christmas. With a little help from the owner, a woman discovers that an event from her past connects the groups and may change their lives.

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple fakes marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival, and their business.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland
programme.desc: A woman brings her kids with her on a business trip to Memphis so they can go to Graceland. While there, she bumps into an old flame from her singing days in college. Together they make beautiful holiday music.

programme.title: Meet Me at Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is forced to take the reins when her son's wedding planner quits on Christmas Eve. She receives some unexpected help from the bride's uncle, and realizes that fate has sent her a man from her past.

programme.title: A Merry Christmas Match
programme.desc: A woman lives in a ski village and works at the local antiques shop. One day, the local 'Christmas Catch Ryder' stops by her shop, and sparks fly between them.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: A mysterious key and riddle land on the doorsteps of two different people, they determine they must work together to solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Angel Tree
programme.desc: A writer seeks the identity of the person who helps grant wishes that are placed upon an Angel tree. In the process, she finds herself reconnecting with her childhood friends.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: An heiress is looking for a low-key Christmas before her life takes over, so she heads to the small-town of Glenbrooke where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: A youth-choir director is tasked with writing the title song for her Christmas Eve show but becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins the choir. Unbeknownst to her, this boy does not tell his widowed father of his plans to sing in the service.

programme.title: The Christmas Bow
programme.desc: When an accident puts her music dreams on hold, a gifted violinist reconnects with an old family friend, who helps her heal and find love during the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas on Honeysuckle Lane
programme.desc: A sister is in charge of selling their recently deceased parents' home, where she and an antiques expert find a hidden surprise that sends them on a journey to discover the power of love and family in the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: A woman wakes up from a dream, holding a wedding dress, and assuming she is about to marry her fiancée. Only, that dream, ended two years before, and she has no idea who her current fiancée is.

programme.title: A Christmas to Remember
programme.desc: A harsh TV personality gets amnesia after a car accident and a friendly passerby takes her in.

programme.desc: A soldier is stabbed to death at a drive-thru. Kenda's only clue is that this is somehow tied to a breakdancing competition. Then a 29-year-old man moves back to Colorado Springs, but at his welcome home party he winds up shot execution-style.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A sharp-dressed pedestrian is shot in the back for unknown reasons. Chasing a promising lead, Kenda realizes he's barking up the wrong tree. Then when an impromptu argument turns fatal, a suspect's guilt boils down to his skill with deadly weapons.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A hostage situation puts Sgt. Joe Kenda and his team to the test, as they try to save a family without getting shot themselves.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman is found in the mountains, naked and covered in blood. As Det. Joe Kenda digs into who she is and what happened to her, he uncovers a world of violence and sexual fetishes, culminating in perhaps the most intense interrogation of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: High in the mountains above Colorado Springs, a woman's frozen body is found along a switchback road. Before investigators can determine who's responsible for her death, they'll need to figure out what brought her here in the first place.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a beloved grandmother is found stabbed to death in her own home, Kenda must turn to a tight-knit community still grieving from the tragic loss. After 12 years of searching, they finally uncover the fiendish plot to exploit the helpless victim.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Sgt. Joe Kenda and his officers are facing off against a barricaded gunman when he gets an emergency call from his wife. Kathy winds up overhearing him being shot at, leading her to grapple with the terrifying realities of being married to a cop.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Soon after the lifeless body of Charlie Tuttle was discovered behind a locked bedroom door, his death was ruled a suicide. Six months later however, Kenda receives an unprompted confession that propels the case in a whole new direction.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young man is found dead behind the wheel of his taxi. With robbery seeming unlikely, Kenda and Gaenzle wonder if this was personal. Could this stem from a dispute at his other job as a radio DJ? A failing marriage? The possibilities seem endless.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Kenda faces his most difficult case yet the slaying of a young boy. After confronting his own demons brought forth by the tragic case, the detective makes the most consequential decision of his career.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Twenty-five year-old artist Tiffany Daniels never makes it home from work. When her car is found abandoned in a Pensacola Beach parking lot, it sets off a desperate search for the missing young woman...and dark speculation about her disappearance.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Jessica Heeringa is working the night shift at a gas station. When a customer arrives just before closing to find the store empty, investigators believe she's been abducted.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: A woman and her 5-year-old son are brutally murdered in a field outside Dallas. A critical piece of evidence found at the scene sends one detective on a 20-year-long hunt for the killer.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: A 59 year old grandmother is discovered beaten and stabbed to death in her home on Mother's Day.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: The town of Indiana, Pennsylvania, is rocked by the murder of Theresa Dalessio. Shot at home with her family nearby, the crime is confounding. Theresa has no obvious enemies, but as evidence emerges, suspects are revealed - including her own husband.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: A divorcee turns to the internet for romance and soon meets a sexy entrepreneur. But when she's found brutally murdered in her own home, detectives discover that Sheila was lured into the dark world of S&M.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: After meeting the woman of his dreams online, radio DJ Alan Lee Lama moves over a thousand miles to be with her. When her best friend gets involved, he gets caught up in a bizarre love triangle.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: After a troubled childhood, 13-year old Christina Long's life seems to be on the up and up. Now living with her beloved Aunt Shelly, Christina is a popular honor student and cheerleader. But when her online life is revealed, it tells a more tragic story.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Unemployed David Pauley applies to a Craigslist ad offering a tantalizing lifeline just as the recession hits. The job sounds perfect: a live-in caretaker for a ranch in Ohio. But just as soon as he is hired, he disappears - and he isn't the first.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On March 18th, 2011, 32-year-old Patty Ayala is murdered at the Burger King where she works. Police find the safe open and a mysterious message next to Patty's body. They turn to surveillance video - and it's there the killer emerges from the shadows.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In December 2013, 25-year-old Josh Richards was gunned down in the Luna Lounge nightclub in Appleton, Wisconsin. When detectives delve deeper into the investigation, they discover a camera has the potential to reveal the identity of a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On April 28th, 2010, 12-year-old Alajawan Brown is gunned down outside a 7-Eleven in Skyway, Washington, a block from an earlier shooting. As police question if the two are related, only CCTV can help piece together the puzzle and ID Alajawan's killer.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On December 23rd 2009, Beth von Steinner goes missing. Days later, her frozen body is found in a trash pile behind her house. With no witness or suspects, only CCTV footage can unlock the mystery of who killed her.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On October 26th, 2009, widower Philip Gatusso is murdered in the quiet town of Fargo, North Dakota. As his in-laws drive across states to care for their now orphaned granddaughter, detectives to turn to a witness that never sleeps - surveillance video.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On December 2nd 2014, Rhonda Daugherty vanishes. Detectives turn to the public for information on her mysterious disappearance. A tip leads investigators to surveillance footage from a hotel where they uncover a journey of duplicity and deception.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On August 25, 2015, 51-year-old care worker Torrance Cheeves is found stabbed to death in his San Antonio, Texas home. With no suspects and a trail of puzzling evidence, investigators turn to surveillance cameras in the surrounding area for answers.

programme.desc: A Karmann Ghia aficionado wants some very specific upgrades for his new purchase. Custom trim, wheels, lowered stance, new paint and new upholstery are some of the items that will give this car a new lease on life.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: When Donnie decides that he wants to take his 1968 Fastback to SEMA, Dan and Fantomworks are thrown for a loop. Now, they need to get the Fastback and a 1964 Corvette to the prestigious show within a crushing time frame.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: We follow the controlled chaos of Fantomworks when there are 85 cars being worked on and multiple owners who expect miracles.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Dan thinks that Mickey's 1970 Chevelle is perfect. Mickey wants them to tear it apart and upgrade everything to make it his own. Thom's 1963 Studebaker is a project car with a nightmare combination of leaks, bad parts, and failing safety systems.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Rick is the proud owner of a garish 1972 Cadillac Hearse. He comes to FantomWorks for a nightmare combination of gadgets, gizmos, and upgrades - including flamethrowers. Merlyn and Lynn have a 1959 Chevy Apache that hasn't been driven beyond their yard.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Scott's '53 Fleetwood is a challenge that takes a turn to the crazy when Dan has to add rare features that the car never had in the first place. John wants FantomWorks to complete a half-finished restoration and get his prized 1967 Mercury running.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: When Rich and Kathy tried to get their 1951 Buick Super back on the road they were taken for a ride. It's now up to FantomWorks to succeed where four other shops failed. Jim's classic 1961 Corvette has a curious ailment, and Dan has to solve the mystery.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: FantomWorks dives into prototype hell to give a former drag racer the superfast 1969 Chevelle of his dreams - complete with a supercharged LT4 engine.

programme.title: FantomWorks

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: When Nick challenges Dan to a Chevelle vs Camaro supercar showdown, Dan is all-in. Now Dan has to build a '69 Camaro Pace Car that can beat the fastest Chevelle that FantomWorks has ever built.

programme.desc: Bobby Cohen spots a rusty British Cab at the junkyard and vows to do what he can to save it. His son Andy thinks he's crazy and makes a big investment in a high dollar Lamborghini Murcielago to recoup the money he worries Bobby will lose.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy Cohen and dad Bobby treat their employees as members of the family, so when Tim's son wants a bigger truck, they happily hook him up. It's going to take a lot to turn a wrecked K-9 explosives police wagon into a camo-wrapped hunting truck.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: When Andy Cohen tries to convert an old Dodge pick-up into a vintage power wagon, his dad Bobby hits the roof. So it's up to Chris and Jeff to turn this rust bucket into gold. Later, Andy buys a German military truck for a crazy advertising scheme.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy attempts to transplant a modern Ford Ecoboost engine into an '85 Mustang SVO, a car built around an outdated 2.3-liter motor. The guys get started on a 1970 GTO Judge, a tribute to Andy's favorite car from the 70s.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire

programme.desc: Russel Douglas was a troubled father hoping for a fresh start when he was found shot dead in his car. The investigation would turn up few clues until an anonymous tipster sent detectives on an international manhunt to unravel a mystery.

programme.title: Dateline: Secrets Uncovered
programme.desc: It was Easter Sunday. The Stock family celebrated at home. Hours later, gunshots turned their farmhouse into a house of horrors. There was an arrest but one tiny clue didn't fit. This case was far from being solved.

programme.title: Dateline: Secrets Uncovered
programme.desc: It was a plot straight out of an Alfred Hitchcock film. A woman peers into a neighbor’s yard and catches a glimpse of something unsettling. What she saw and what she did set a chain of events in motion that would divide a family and a jury.

programme.title: Dateline: Secrets Uncovered
programme.desc: It was a brutal and baffling crime: a husband shot dead in his own bed. No one else in the house was hurt, not even his wife, who was sleeping beside him. Investigators were suspicious, but there were more surprises in store.

programme.title: Buried in the Backyard
programme.desc: When a lovesick teen goes missing, investigators in Indiana learn she's harboring a deep secret. And when a couple of teens make a horrifying discovery in the woods, it's clear the secrets in one high school run darker and deeper than they imagined.

programme.title: Buried in the Backyard

programme.title: Buried in the Backyard

programme.title: Buried in the Backyard
programme.desc: A pleasant Michigan day takes a dark turn when a field hand digs up a human skull in a sprawling backyard. The discovery leaves a tight knit community shaken to its core and questioning whether a killer has penetrated the safety of their town.

programme.title: Buried in the Backyard
programme.desc: When a private investigator disappears with tens of thousands of dollars, Florida detectives question whether she's alive and well. But when a buried body is uncovered, they chase a trail of secrets and lies to catch a killer just out of reach.

programme.desc: The murder of a petty officer leads Pride and his team to a mysterious woman who is targeting men with high security clearance. Also, Lasalle's father, Beau, arrives in town to discuss the family business.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS is called to investigate after a clinical trial of brain implants in veterans is hacked. Also, Patton must work alongside his ex-wife, who spearheads the project.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Wade's son Danny calls Pride for help after he's attacked at his girlfriend's house and she goes missing. Also, the director of NCIS mandates that Pride meet with a therapist to discuss his process for solving cases.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride second-guesses evidence suggesting homeless kids are the suspects in the murder of a petty officer.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Rita Deveraux tells Pride that Douglas Hamilton is about to make a deal to get out of prison, Pride and the team rehash the Clearwater case in hopes of locating his mystery partner and spoiling his bargaining chip.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a deadly armed robbery and high-speed chase is connected to an undercover ATF operation, Percy reconnects with her former ATF partner, Jake Roman.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Sebastian receives a plea for help from his high school friend after her business partner is killed at the Crescent City Gaming Convention. Also, a FBI special agent believes Adrian is a hacker the Cyber Crimes division has been tracking for years.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A petty officer's murder leads the team to a family-owned night club where Pride's mother used to perform weekly. Also, Lasalle must urgently return home to Alabama after receiving an unexpected call from his family.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a petty officer who was in town to help a refugee family being recruited by terrorists. Also, Wade works on the special election campaign for Mayor Zahra Taylor that takes place during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: FBI Special Agent Raymond Isler asks Pride for help with an off-the-books opioids theft investigation he is personally invested in. Also, Percy is sent undercover as a getaway driver with Isler as the muscle for a job tied to the case.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS investigates the disappearance of a congressional aide after a hitman saves her from two men posing as NCIS agents. Also, Lasalle struggles with life-altering decisions regarding his brother's future.

programme.desc: Jimmy and Don Hardy use many baits to fish in Florida.
